data.text: «Naama vaiti pɛtɛga laawu, zìi ɠa ɲiikpisu kòozu, eɠɛ a ɠɛ ɠɛɛzu é ʋili, é ɠula tosuʋɛ.
À woilo, à woilo dɛɛ GALA gooi lugi ma,
GALA ka ɗa ná-mainmain zaɠa mini-o-mini geezuʋɛ,
Tɔun poluʋelei, GALA gooi ɠa ɗa ɠula, é ɗa zikɔ,
Maayiki vaa ʋe, ʋelei GALA ge zikɔzu la ga gooi,
Toɠa ɗa ɠɛ kɔɔlɛ vukɔi ma: ‹Ʋu eteai zu,›
Naama ziɛgi zu, nuɓusɛiti ti la mɔ zooga faa nɔpɛ kɛɛzu,
Anɛɛ dɔɓɔ zuaiti ta ɗa ɓɔɠɔ maalɔɔɠu,
Tɔngɔlɔ fiilɛi ɠa ɗa zeɠe ga lɛkpɛma ʋelei nu yeezazuʋɛ,
Ziɛi ɠaa ɠa ɗa ɲi ga GALA daa viilɛi maaʋele,
GALA ka ɗa tonaɓiingiti kasɔɠili ga dɛilɛigi,
Zekana a ɗa ti ziɛziɛ da adaʋɛ pɛ,
Kɛɛʋɛ eɠɛ kpakɔi ɠa é eteai loɠazu la,
«Zɔɓe, woilo dɛɛ niima vaiti ma.
È kwɛɛ nɛi ɓaa, ʋelei GALA ge losu da niima vaiti untuɠɔ,
È kwɛni ɓaa, ʋelei tonaɓiingiti ta lo da kpɛ?
Ɗɔun ɗa kaazu ga è maaɠiliʋɛ gola, die golai zei è ma,
Ɗa la zoo nɛi è ɓɔ GALA ba, siɛgi zu é ɠɛni geeɠɔlɔgi ɓɛtɛzu la,
«Ɗa zoo nɛi, è naa lɛ ga giye, nii gá bo ma?
Siɛgi zu gè kpɔɛi wosu da, kɛni é loo ɠisu ɓaa?
«Wɛlɛ, gaamago nɔ, nu la mɔ wozaɠaazu fɔɔn,
Wozakalagi é volozu, naa ɠa wuzeɠezu ga lɛkpɛma ʋelei nu ɠɔʋɛzuʋɛ.
Toɠa ga Zɛbɛi-Pɛ-Maliɠii, de la zooga vɔɔɠuzu ba,
Naa ɠa é ba, nuiti maanɛɛʋɛ ti lua ba,
